hooks.command: TRANSCRIPT_PATH=$(jq -r '.transcript_path' | sed 's|^~|'"$HOME"'|'); TITLE=$(tac "$TRANSCRIPT_PATH" | grep -m 1 '"type":"text"' | jq -r '.message.content[0].text' | head -c 24); TITLE=${TITLE:-"ClaudeCode FINISHED"}; osascript -e 'beep 1'; open -g "hammerspoon://alert-claudecode?title=${TITLE}&duration=10"
